content:
My dad and I thought we would try the card game baccarat. As Lt. Cmdr. Data might say, 'This is highly irregular.'

I was banker, my dad was the player.

The first two cards for both of us were a King and a Jack. Since my dad's score was 0, I drew him a third card: a nine. Since he had a nine and my score was 0, I drew a third card: a nine. A tie.

This was a well-shuffled deck.

Our next two deals were ties as well.

media_attachments.description: First hand in a game of baccarat. The cards for both banker and player were exactly the same: first two cards were a King and a Jack, and the third card was a nine. This resulted in a tie.

content: Available in the Public Domain is the sf novel This Crowded Earth by Robert Bloch. One of many stories about an overpopulated Earth, this one stands out by being rather insane. The solution to overcrowding is so bizarre and strange that it makes it all kind of worth it. https://gutenberg.org/cache/epub/25776/pg25776-images.html

content:
#ToolOfTheDay is actually a source of free tools.

Ask your dentist what they do with their worn out dental pick/probes. Usually they are reconditioned/sharpened some number of times and then deemed not suitable for use.

If you can get your dentist to collect the ones due to be tossed for your next visit, you will have a fine collection of very handy surgical quality items.

I have a pair of forceps that I got this way 50 years ago (worn grip teeth). I still use them regularly.
